deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
butterWeight is the amount of matter in the universe that is currently outstanding.
 butterSpread is the amount of matter that has been distributed from butterWeight, thus reducing its value.
 butterJars represent the total number of matter contracts created in the Universe.

buttersOfNut represents a list of all butter contracts created byt that nut.
 butterLocations represents the address of contract identifed by butterId.

butterWeight().notice: butterWeight is the amount of matter in the universe that is currently outstanding. butterSpread is the amount of matter that has been distributed from butterWeight, thus reducing its value. butterJars represent the total number of matter contracts created in the Universe.

buttersOfNut(uint256,uint256).notice: buttersOfNut represents a list of all butter contracts created byt that nut. butterLocations represents the address of contract identifed by butterId.
